title: National debt of Nigeria in relation to gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2024
yAxis: National debt in relation to GDP
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing National debt in relation to GDP, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general National debt in relation to GDP has rose over the Year.
National debt in relation to GDP is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2019, and finally roughly constant from 2019 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum National debt in relation to GDP, about 35.98 was reported at Year 2024
The lowest National debt in relation to GDP, of value 17.54 was reported at Year 2014
